languages.text: "Видимо, твой путь был темнее и кровавее моего, раз из всех решений ты предпочитаешь самое жестокое. В твоей реальности много боли".
"Your path must have been darker and bloodier than mine, seeing as you prefer to choose the most violent solution. There is much pain in your reality."
languages.original_text: "Видимо, твой путь был темнее и кровавее моего, раз из всех решений ты предпочитаешь самое жестокое. В твоей реальности много боли".

traits.locale_text: "Your path must have been darker and bloodier than mine if you prefer the most violent solution of them all. There is much pain in your reality."
"Your path must have been darker and bloodier than mine if you prefer the most violent solution of them all. There is much pain in your reality."
"Your path must have been darker and bloodier than mine, seeing as you prefer the most violent solution of them all. There is much pain in your reality."
"Your path must have been darker and bloodier than mine, seeing as you prefer the most violent solution of them all. There is much pain in your reality."
"Your path must have been darker and bloodier than mine, seeing as you prefer to choose the most violent solution. There is much pain in your reality."
"Your path must have been darker and bloodier than mine, seeing as you prefer to choose the most violent solution. There is much pain in your reality."

languages.text: « Vous avez dû suivre une voie plus sombre et plus sanglante que la mienne pour préférer la plus violente des solutions. Il y a beaucoup de souffrance dans votre réalité. »
languages.original_text: "Your path must have been darker and bloodier than mine, seeing as you prefer to choose the most violent solution. There is much pain in your reality."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez dû suivre une voie plus sombre et plus sanglante que la mienne pour préférer la plus violente des solutions. Il y a beaucoup de souffrance dans votre réalité. »

languages.text: «Tu camino debe de haber sido más oscuro y sangriento que el mío, dado que prefieres la solución más violenta. Tu realidad es muy dolorosa».
languages.original_text: "Your path must have been darker and bloodier than mine, seeing as you prefer to choose the most violent solution. There is much pain in your reality."

traits.locale_text: «Tu camino debe de haber sido más oscuro y sangriento que el mío, dado que prefieres la violencia. Tu realidad es muy dolorosa».

languages.text: “你的道路恐怕比我的道路更黑暗、更血腥吧，因为你喜欢靠最暴力的手段解决问题。你的现实中肯定有很多痛苦。”
languages.original_text: "Your path must have been darker and bloodier than mine, seeing as you prefer to choose the most violent solution. There is much pain in your reality."

traits.locale_text: “你的道路恐怕比我的道路更黑暗、更血腥吧，因为你喜欢靠最暴力的手段解决问题。你的现实中肯定有很多痛苦。”

languages.text: 「お前が最も暴力的な解決策を好むところを見ると、お前の道は私よりも暗く血なまぐさいものだったのだろうな。その現実には、あまたの痛みが横たわっている」
languages.original_text: "Your path must have been darker and bloodier than mine, seeing as you prefer to choose the most violent solution. There is much pain in your reality."

traits.locale_text: 「お前が最も暴力的な解決策を好むところを見ると、お前の道は私よりも暗く血なまぐさいものだったのだろうな。その現実には、あまたの痛みが横たわっている」

languages.text: "Euer Pfad muss dunkler und blutiger gewesen sein als meiner, wenn Ihr die gewalttätigste aller Lösungen vorzieht. In Eurer Realität gibt es viel Schmerz."
languages.original_text: "Your path must have been darker and bloodier than mine, seeing as you prefer to choose the most violent solution. There is much pain in your reality."

traits.locale_text: "Euer Pfad muss dunkler und blutiger gewesen sein als meiner, wenn Ihr die gewalttätigste aller Lösungen vorzieht. In Eurer Realität gibt es viel Schmerz."
